forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
